title: Subpart 1100-11 - Modifying, transferring or relinquishing permits
content:
Subpart 1100-11 - Modifying, transferring or relinquishing permits

State Regulations
§ 1100-11.1 - Permit modifications requested by Permittee
§ 1100-11.2 - Transfers of Permit and Pending Applications
§ 1100-11.3 - Relinquishments
§ 1100-11.4 - Permit Modifications by the Office

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
